**夏威夷衬衫**（hawaiian shirt）是[NetHack](/index.php?title=NetHack/zh-CN\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "NetHack/zh-CN (page does not exist)")中的一种[衬衫](/wiki/%E8%A1%AC%E8%A1%AB "衬衫")类[防具](/wiki/%E9%98%B2%E5%85%B7 "防具")。它由[布](/index.php?title=%E5%B8%83\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "布 (page does not exist)")制成。

[ ]

## 生成

夏威夷衬衫在随机生成防具中占0.8%。

[游客](/index.php?title=%E6%B8%B8%E5%AE%A2\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "游客 (page does not exist)")在游戏开始时拥有一件未诅咒的+0夏威夷衬衫[\[1\]](#cite_note-1)。

*以下内容涉及即将到来的版本（[NetHack 3.7.0](/wiki/NetHack_3.7.0 "NetHack 3.7.0")）之信息。如果该版本已发布，请验证此处信息是否准确，并作出相应修改，以将其并入页面。*

根据[commit 20cbadc](https://github.com/NetHack/NetHack/commit/20cbadcf85544cf9d0c3f4e4200b2800bab49c8e)，[游客任务](/index.php?title=%E6%B8%B8%E5%AE%A2%E4%BB%BB%E5%8A%A1\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "游客任务 (page does not exist)")的领袖[双花](/index.php?title=%E5%8F%8C%E8%8A%B1\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "双花 (page does not exist)")在生成时会[携带](/index.php?title=%E6%80%AA%E7%89%A9%E8%B5%B7%E5%A7%8B%E7%89%A9%E5%93%81\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "怪物起始物品 (page does not exist)")一件+3夏威夷衬衫。

## 描述

夏威夷衬衫的基础[AC](/index.php?title=AC/zh-CN\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "AC/zh-CN (page does not exist)")加成为0。

若角色将夏威夷衬衫穿在身体最外面（即只穿衬衫，不穿[铠甲](/wiki/%E9%93%A0%E7%94%B2 "铠甲")和[斗篷](/wiki/%E6%96%97%E7%AF%B7 "斗篷")），进入[商店](/index.php?title=%E5%95%86%E5%BA%97\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "商店 (page does not exist)")会使得[店主](/index.php?title=%E5%BA%97%E4%B8%BB\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "店主 (page does not exist)")将所有商品的出售价提升1⁄3，且基础买入价降低至基础价的1⁄3。

*以下内容涉及即将到来的版本（[NetHack 3.7.0](/wiki/NetHack_3.7.0 "NetHack 3.7.0")）之信息。如果该版本已发布，请验证此处信息是否准确，并作出相应修改，以将其并入页面。*

现在阅读夏威夷衬衫会产生一条消息，描述衬衫的设计。衬衫的设计取决于其物品ID。

## 策略

和T恤衫一样，夏威夷衬衫一般用来在提升附魔后穿在铠甲里面提供额外的防御。但要注意，如果你意外被[变形陷阱](/index.php?title=%E5%8F%98%E5%BD%A2%E9%99%B7%E9%98%B1\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "变形陷阱 (page does not exist)")变形，你的躯干防具可能被撑破，因此最好在获得针对变形的保护措施后再穿衬衫。游客角色要记得开局时就将衬衫脱掉，以避免商店涨价，并且将衬衫安全地保留到后续使用。如果你有多余的[许愿](/index.php?title=%E8%AE%B8%E6%84%BF\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "许愿 (page does not exist)")机会，你可以考虑许愿获取附魔的夏威夷衬衫来补足你的[飞升套件](/index.php?title=%E9%A3%9E%E5%8D%87%E5%A5%97%E4%BB%B6\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "飞升套件 (page does not exist)")。

如果不介意使用[批量变形](/index.php?title=%E6%89%B9%E9%87%8F%E5%8F%98%E5%BD%A2\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "批量变形 (page does not exist)")，你可以通过[变形](/index.php?title=%E5%8F%98%E5%BD%A2\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "变形 (page does not exist)")一大堆防具（可以从[城堡](/index.php?title=%E5%9F%8E%E5%A0%A1\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "城堡 (page does not exist)")或[吕底人堡垒](/index.php?title=%E5%90%95%E5%BA%95%E4%BA%BA%E5%A0%A1%E5%9E%92\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "吕底人堡垒 (page does not exist)")获得大量防具）来获得衬衫。城堡里的防具仓库有13.13%的概率生成至少一件衬衫，[奥迦斯镇](/index.php?title=%E5%A5%A5%E8%BF%A6%E6%96%AF%E9%95%87\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "奥迦斯镇 (page does not exist)")中的废弃商店也可能出现衬衫。

## 历史

夏威夷衬衫最初于[NetHack 2.3e](/wiki/NetHack_2.3e "NetHack 2.3e")加入游戏。在旧版本中，夏威夷衬衫只有在开启`SHIRT`[编译时选项](/index.php?title=%E7%BC%96%E8%AF%91%E6%97%B6%E9%80%89%E9%A1%B9\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "编译时选项 (page does not exist)")时才会在游戏里生成，在[NetHack 3.1.0](/wiki/NetHack_3.1.0 "NetHack 3.1.0")则改为需要开启`TOURIST`选项。

## Variants

**此条目或段落的部分内容需要翻译。**  
您可以帮助我们[**翻译此页面**](https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Hawaiian_shirt/zh-CN\&action=edit)，但**请勿使用机器翻译**。

### NetHack brass

In [NetHack brass](/wiki/NetHack_brass "NetHack brass"), stylish clothing stores can sell Hawaiian shirts.

### SLASH'EM

In [SLASH'EM](/wiki/SLASH%27EM "SLASH'EM"), the two [tourist](/wiki/Tourist_\(player_monster\) "Tourist (player monster)") [player monsters](/wiki/Player_monster "Player monster") in [The Guild of Disgruntled Adventurers](/wiki/The_Guild_of_Disgruntled_Adventurers "The Guild of Disgruntled Adventurers") generate with Hawaiian shirts.

### dNetHack

In [dNetHack](/wiki/DNetHack "DNetHack") and [notdNetHack](/wiki/NotdNetHack "NotdNetHack"), the Hawaiian shirt confers 0 base AC and 0 base [DR](/wiki/DR "DR") while worn, and appears as a **flowery shirt** when unidentified.

Twoflower [always generates with](/wiki/Monster_starting_inventory "Monster starting inventory") a blessed +0 Hawaiian shirt.

### xNetHack

In [xNetHack](/wiki/XNetHack "XNetHack"), Hawaiian shirts that are not worn under body armor can be read to print a message describing the shirt's pattern.

Twoflower always generates with a +3 Hawaiian shirt.

### SpliceHack

In [SpliceHack](/wiki/SpliceHack "SpliceHack"), the [Cartomancer](/wiki/Cartomancer "Cartomancer") role starts with a +0 Hawaiian shirt.

### EvilHack

In [EvilHack](/wiki/EvilHack "EvilHack"), Hawaiian shirts that are not worn under body armor can be read to print a message describing the shirt's pattern. [Tortles](/wiki/Tortle_\(starting_race\) "Tortle (starting race)") that play as Tourists have their starting shirt replaced with a [toque](/wiki/Toque "Toque").

Twoflower always generates with a Hawaiian shirt, and player monster tourists that are not [tortles](/index.php?title=Tortle_\(monster_attribute\)\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Tortle (monster attribute) (page does not exist)") will generate with Hawaiian shirts.

Hawaiian shirts can be made of other materials such as [leather](/wiki/Leather "Leather"), which provides some base [AC](/wiki/AC "AC") and may make them more valuable to wear early on. Shirt wishes are just as popular as in *NetHack* if not more so: [object materials](/wiki/Object_materials_\(EvilHack\) "Object materials (EvilHack)") and [properties](/wiki/Object_properties "Object properties") make the shirt slot valuable for characters that are not [giants](/wiki/Giant_\(starting_race\) "Giant (starting race)") or tortles. An example of such a wish is "blessed greased fixed +3 [dragonhide](/wiki/Dragonhide "Dragonhide") Hawaiian shirt of decay", with "decay" being an object property that provides [drain resistance](/wiki/Drain_resistance "Drain resistance").

### SlashTHEM

In addition to SLASH'EM details, [SlashTHEM](/wiki/SlashTHEM "SlashTHEM") adds [Musa-Shiya](/wiki/Musa-Shiya "Musa-Shiya"), an [artifact](/wiki/Artifact "Artifact") Hawaiian shirt that grants a +2 AC bonus and [hallucination resistance](/wiki/Hallucination_resistance "Hallucination resistance") while worn, and can be [invoked](/wiki/Invoked "Invoked") for [enlightenment](/wiki/Enlightenment "Enlightenment").

### Hack'EM

In [Hack'EM](/wiki/Hack%27EM "Hack'EM"), Hawaiian shirts can only be made of cloth, as in SLASH'EM.

## 百科文本

'One of the things he can't do, he can't ride a horse,' he  
said. Then he stiffened as if sandbagged by a sudden  
recollection, gave a small yelp of terror and dashed into  
the gloom. When he returned, the being called Twoflower was  
hanging limply over his shoulder. It was small and skinny,  
and dressed very oddly in a pair of knee-length britches and  
a shirt in such a violent and vivid conflict of colours that  
the Weasel's fastidious eye was offended even in the half-light.

\[ The Colour of Magic, by Terry Pratchett ]

和T恤衫一样，夏威夷衬衫一般用来在提升附魔后穿在铠甲里面提供额外的防御。但要注意，如果你意外被变形陷阱变形，你的躯干防具可能被撑破，因此最好在获得针对变形的保护措施后再穿衬衫。游客角色要记得开局时就将衬衫脱掉，以避免商店涨价，并且将衬衫安全地保留到后续使用。如果你有多余的许愿机会，你可以考虑许愿获取附魔的夏威夷衬衫来补足你的飞升套件。

|cost=3 |weight=5 |material=布 }} '''夏威夷衬衫'''（hawaiian shirt）是{{cnlink|NetHack}}中的一种[[衬衫]]类[[防具]]。它由[[布]]制成。 == 生成 == 夏威夷衬衫在随机生成防具中占0.8%。 [[游客]]在游戏开始时拥有一件未诅咒的+0夏威夷衬衫{{refsrc|src/u_init.c|147|nethack=3.6.7}}。 {{upcoming/zh-CN|NetHack 3.7.0|根据{{commit|20cbadcf85544cf9d0c3f4e4200b2800bab49c8e|commit 20cbadc}}，[[游客任务]]的领袖[[双花]]在生成时会[[怪物起始物品|携带]]一件+3夏威夷衬衫。}} == 描述 == 夏威夷衬衫的基础{{cnlink|AC}}加成为0。 若角色将夏威夷衬衫穿在身体最外面（即只穿衬衫，不穿[[铠甲]]和[[斗篷]]），进入[[商店]]会使得[[店主]]将所有商品的出售价提升{{frac|3}}，且基础买入价降低至基础价的{{frac|3}}。 {{upcoming/zh-CN|NetHack 3.7.0|现在阅读夏威夷衬衫会产生一条消息，描述衬衫的设计。衬衫的设计取决于其物品ID。}} == 策略 == 和T恤衫一样，夏威夷衬衫一般用来在提升附魔后穿在铠甲里面提供额外的防御。但要注意，如果你意外被[[变形陷阱]]变形，你的躯干防具可能被撑破，因此最好在获得针对变形的保护措施后再穿衬衫。游客角色要记得开局时就将衬衫脱掉，以避免商店涨价，并且将衬衫安全地保留到后续使用。如果你有多余的[[许愿]]机会，你可以考虑许愿获取附魔的夏威夷衬衫来补足你的[[飞升套件]]。 如果不介意使用[[批量变形]]，你可以通过[[变形]]一大堆防具（可以从[[城堡]]或[[吕底人堡垒]]获得大量防具）来获得衬衫。城堡里的防具仓库有13.13%的概率生成至少一件衬衫，[[奥迦斯镇]]中的废弃商店也可能出现衬衫。 == 历史 == 夏威夷衬衫最初于[[NetHack 2.3e]]加入游戏。在旧版本中，夏威夷衬衫只有在开启SHIRT[[编译时选项]]时才会在游戏里生成，在[[NetHack 3.1.0]]则改为需要开启TOURIST选项。 ==Variants== {{translation/zh-CN|n}} ===NetHack brass=== In [[NetHack brass]], stylish clothing stores can sell Hawaiian shirts. ===SLASH'EM=== In [[SLASH'EM]], the two [[Tourist (player monster)|tourist]] [[player monster]]s in [[The Guild of Disgruntled Adventurers]] generate with Hawaiian shirts. ===dNetHack=== In [[dNetHack]] and [[notdNetHack]], the Hawaiian shirt confers 0 base AC and 0 base [[DR]] while worn, and appears as a '''flowery shirt''' when unidentified. Twoflower [[Monster starting inventory|always generates with]] a blessed +0 Hawaiian shirt. ===xNetHack=== In [[xNetHack]], Hawaiian shirts that are not worn under body armor can be read to print a message describing the shirt's pattern. Twoflower always generates with a +3 Hawaiian shirt. ===SpliceHack=== In [[SpliceHack]], the [[Cartomancer]] role starts with a +0 Hawaiian shirt. ===EvilHack=== In [[EvilHack]], Hawaiian shirts that are not worn under body armor can be read to print a message describing the shirt's pattern. [[Tortle (starting race)|Tortles]] that play as Tourists have their starting shirt replaced with a [[toque]]. Twoflower always generates with a Hawaiian shirt, and player monster tourists that are not [[Tortle (monster attribute)|tortles]] will generate with Hawaiian shirts. Hawaiian shirts can be made of other materials such as [[leather]], which provides some base [[AC]] and may make them more valuable to wear early on. Shirt wishes are just as popular as in ''NetHack'' if not more so: [[Object materials (EvilHack)|object materials]] and [[Object properties|properties]] make the shirt slot valuable for characters that are not [[Giant (starting race)|giants]] or tortles. An example of such a wish is "blessed greased fixed +3 [[dragonhide]] Hawaiian shirt of decay", with "decay" being an object property that provides [[drain resistance]]. ===SlashTHEM=== In addition to SLASH'EM details, [[SlashTHEM]] adds [[Musa-Shiya]], an [[artifact]] Hawaiian shirt that grants a +2 AC bonus and [[hallucination resistance]] while worn, and can be [[invoked]] for [[enlightenment]]. ===Hack'EM=== In [[Hack'EM]], Hawaiian shirts can only be made of cloth, as in SLASH'EM. == 百科文本 == {{encyclopedia| 'One of the things he can't do, he can't ride a horse,' he said. Then he stiffened as if sandbagged by a sudden recollection, gave a small yelp of terror and dashed into the gloom. When he returned, the being called Twoflower was hanging limply over his shoulder. It was small and skinny, and dressed very oddly in a pair of knee-length britches and a shirt in such a violent and vivid conflict of colours that the Weasel's fastidious eye was offended even in the half-light. |[ The Colour of Magic, by Terry Pratchett ] }} == 引用及注释 == {{nethack-367/zh-CN}} [[Category:shirts/zh-CN|XIAWEIYICHENSHAN]]
